An
is a relationship that is between:
an idealisation of an action for analysis; and
a discretised action analysis model. that indicates the discretised action analysis model is a model of the idealised action created for the purpose of numerical analysis.
the identifier for the .
the words by which the is known.
the text that provides further information about the . The value of this attribute need not be specified.
the discretised action model created for numerical analysis.
the idealisation of an action for which a discretised model is created.

An is a relationship between a beam property and the idealization of that beam property.
the identifier for the .
the words by which the is known.

the text that provides further information about the .
The value of this attribute need not be specified.
